data.name: HTD Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: The full haunting soundtrack of HTD composed by Mitchell Kennedy, with extra tracks by Saint and D-Tarrow. Contains 50 minutes of music, including two additional bonus tracks not present in the main game.
data.about_the_game: The full haunting soundtrack of HTD composed by Mitchell Kennedy, with extra tracks by Saint and D-Tarrow. Contains 50 minutes of music, including two additional bonus tracks not present in the main game.
data.short_description: The full haunting soundtrack of HTD composed by Mitchell Kennedy, with extra tracks by Saint and D-Tarrow. Contains 50 minutes of music, including two additional bonus tracks not present in the main game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 72 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 536 MB available space
